name: Nether (itch)
description:
The upload below is the x86 build T.T Please click here to download the x86_64 build.

Will you survive the Nether? Guide your wyrm past obstacles and collect energy to score points as you descend into the deepest depths of deepness. 

Controls

  • WASD to move the head
  • Arrow keys to move the tail
  • Move mouse to look around
